summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2592, for the improvement of the east half of 12th Avenue South from the north margin of Charles Street to the south margin of Massachusetts Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by planking, the planking on Norman Street to be 20 feet in width, under Ordinance No. 30247 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
